summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to other legal team members, transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing (ECF filing) made on August 24, 2021, in relation to the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Bobbi Sternheim
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing to the defense legal team.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email regarding the court filing.

persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the court filing.

persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the court filing.

Sternheim copies Everdel on the email transmitting a legal filing.

events.title: ECF Court Filing
events.description: A court filing was made electronically (ECF) in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, which is being distributed to the defense team.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 24, 2021, from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim.
The email transmits a courtesy copy of an Electronic Court Filing (ECF) made that day.
The recipients are other members of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team: Laura Menninger, Christian Everdel, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The subject line '330 (MN)' likely refers to a specific docket or case number related to the Maxwell prosecution.
This shows ongoing legal activity and coordination within Maxwell's defense team in August 2021.
